articles.description: The GMA T.50 is unlike anything else on the market, and this video shows a fully-functional prototype taking low-speed laps at Dunsfold in the UK.
articles.content: These days, the world is positively packed with supercars and hypercars. By that, we mean the world is packed with a few real cars and a slew of incredible concepts that promise extraordinary perform… [+1899 chars]
